author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: White House says U.S. has "deep concerns" about violence in Israel - Region - World
text:
Related Israeli police shoot dead Palestinian after alleged attack Picture of the day: Palestinian woman slingshots Israeli occupation soldiers Israel to set-up checkpoints in East Jerusalem; Palestinian general strikes in Bethlehem, Sakhneen Outbreak of violence between Palestinians and Israelis The White House said on Wednesday that it has "deep concerns" about violence in Israel and condemns the loss of any innocent life, whether it be Israeli and Palestinian .
White House spokesman Josh Earnest said the United States is in regular contact with Israeli and Palestinian officials about the escalating violence .
